page.title: 16GARAGES
page.content: There are three garages in the village. 1.Antelope Garage. This garage was opened in 1973.They are the agents for Volvo cars but also sell second hand vehicles.As well as petrol(which is not self service),the garage also sells tobacco.Among the seventeen employees are those that are responsible for repairs and MOT's.Friday is their busiest day. 2.Unaroy Garage. This garage shares its site with the Silverline Coach Company.The 6 employees sell petrol,second hand cars and do repairs. 3.Wheelers Garage. This garage opened in 1930 and was owned by Mr. Wheeler until he retired in 1979.They are agents for Talbot /Peugeot and sell second hand cars.The 15 workers do repairs and MOT.Petrol is self serve.Other goods are sold
